Name: Replica Monodrone
Languages: Modron, can understand Common but speaks only preprogrammed responses
Traits: Axiomatic Mind. The monodrone can't be compelled to act in a manner contrary to its nature or its instructions. Dismantlable. If the replica monodrone dies, its body falls into a pile of parts (gears, plates, screws, and wires), leaving behind its weapons and anything else it was carrying.
Actions: Dagger. Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) piercing damage. Javelin. Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d6) piercing damage.
